item.description:
T68- Young Designer's Showcase
Peter Wiederspahn AIA (moderator) , Wiederspahn Architecture, Somerville, MA
6:00PM - 7:30PM-Thursday


Representatives of the BSA?s Future of design exhibit selection committee and designers whose work is included in the exhibit discuss design challenges, innovative ways of working, collaboration and more in this open forum.


This is a session at the BSA's Residential Design & Construction conference. The cost is $10. You can preregister or pay at the door. Please read below:


* If you are already registered to attend the conference, please call 1-800-544-1898 and tell them to add this event to your registration.

* If you are not already registered for RDC and would like to attend, you can register at www.rdcboston.com

* If you are not planning to attend any other sessions at RDC, but you want to register for this event or another evening event only, you can register as a "member of the public" at the door to avoid the exhibit hall fee.
item.name: Young Designer's Showcase
